title: Falló la conexión segura
content: Un error ocurrió durante una conexión a nortonsafe.search.ask.com. SSL ha recibido un registro que excedía la longitud máxima permitida. Código de error: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG
creator: delfinasalinasgonzalez

title: Update pop-up
content:
I am using v. 104.0.1 Every time I open the browser I get the pop-up notifying me that an update is available. I don't want to update at this time. I can and will update when I prefer to. How can I get this annoying pop-up to stop? Please don't make me go to Edge. Please.

Thank you.
creator: rbcooner3

title: When I open Firefox it opens a totally blank page. If I open another tab it looks like it should look with a search bar and quck access buttons.
content: When I open Firefox it opens to a totally blank page. If I open another tab it looks like it should look with a search bar and quick access buttons. How do I get this info to the first tab when it opens?
creator: jesspj

title: I already have Mozilla Firefox but not as my search engine.  I all so get up dates, but Firefox is not my Browser.  What do I need to do to make Firefox my Browser ???? Help.
content: I need The Firefox to become my search engine or Browser. I have been get the updates but Firefox did not become my Browser Help what do I do.???? I do not have a search engine Firefox will not down load why?
creator: fordj2

title: Accidentally used Close All Windows with 4 windows open, main window gone
content:
I used Windows function to close all windows to close firefox. Big mistake. I had 4 windows open and for some reason, Firefox decides to only save 3. I lost my main window with a few hundred tabs open. I realized that when I opened firefox back up and immediately wanted to restore it using Recently Closed Windows, which usually works, but not this time, because it's been 4 windows. I backed up the sessionstore-backups folder but it seems like the "upgrade" files are too large for it to handle and the recovery files don't contain the missing window.

Help?

On Windows 11, latest version, lots of addons including tree-style-tab, so empty header tabs are in the file for my pinned tabs.
creator: creak1
